content: कायः, --यं [चीयतेऽस्मिन् अस्थ्यादिक मिति कायः; चि-घञ् आदेः ककारः <ls>P. III. 3. 41</ls> <ls>Sk.</ls>] {@--1@} The body; विभाति कायः करुणापराणा परोपकारैर्न तु चंदनेन <ls>Bh. 2. 71</ls>; कायेन मनसा बुद्ध्या <ls>Bg. 5. 11</ls>; so कायेन वाचा, मनसा &c. {@--2@} The trunk of a tree. {@--3@} The body of a lute (the whole lute except the wires). {@--4@} A multitude, assemblage, collection. {@--5@} Principal, capital. {@--6@} Home, residence, habitation. {@--7@} A butt, a mark. {@--8@} Natural temperament. --यं (with or without तीर्थ) The part of the hand just below the fingers, especially the little finger, or the last two fingers (this part being considered sacred to Prajāpati is called प्रजापतितीर्थ; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Ms. 2. 58-59</ls>). --यः One of the eight forms of marriage, generally known as प्राजापत्य <ab>q. v.</ab>; <ls>Y. 1. 60</ls>; <ls>Ms. 3. 38.</ls>

कायः, --यं [चीयतेऽस्मिन् अस्थ्यादिक मिति कायः; चि-घञ् आदेः ककारः <ls>P. III. 3. 41</ls> <ls>Sk.</ls>] {@--1@} The body; विभाति कायः करुणापराणा परोपकारैर्न तु चंदनेन <ls>Bh. 2. 71</ls>; कायेन मनसा बुद्ध्या <ls>Bg. 5. 11</ls>; so कायेन वाचा, मनसा &c. {@--2@} The trunk of a tree. {@--3@} The body of a lute (the whole lute except the wires). {@--4@} A multitude, assemblage, collection. {@--5@} Principal, capital. {@--6@} Home, residence, habitation. {@--7@} A butt, a mark. {@--8@} Natural temperament. --यं (with or without तीर्थ) The part of the hand just below the fingers, especially the little finger, or the last two fingers (this part being considered sacred to Prajāpati is called प्रजापतितीर्थ; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Ms. 2. 58-59</ls>). --यः One of the eight forms of marriage, generally known as प्राजापत्य <ab>q. v.</ab>; <ls>Y. 1. 60</ls>; <ls>Ms. 3. 38.</ls>
